context.p: To divert to a host destination when your packets need to be backed up on a separate server.

step.cmd: For the Route option, select With headers.

stepresult.p: The displayed header size changes based on the type selected.

step.cmd: To indicate how much of the original message to include in the payload, drag the Payload Slider.
On the payload diagram, click the header type.

stepresult.p: The input fields displayed below the payload diagram vary with the header selected.

step.cmd: Complete the fields for the header selected.

taskbody.result: Feedback from designated host servers will confirm that the diversion configuration setting have been loaded.
